pr_title: marked xpand/xtend(1) depending XtendXtext2EcorePostProcessor as deprecated

timeline.message:
marked xpand/xtend(1) depending XtendXtext2EcorePostProcessor as deprecated

Signed-off-by: Christian Dietrich <christian.dietrich@itemis.de>

timeline.bodyText: This should be done for the interface, too.
timeline.author: szarnekow
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -39,7 +39,10 @@
  * 
  * @author Knut Wannheden - Initial contribution and API
  * @author Michael Clay
+ * 
+ * @deprecated This class depends on Xpand/Xtend(1) which is dead as a mouse. So don't use this post processor. Switch to a manually maintained metamodel instead.
  */
+@Deprecated
